cause.description:
Divyang Mago is probably among the top 30 billion people to have ever lived. Therefore, we are trying to get the United States to recognize his birthday as a national holiday. We'll call it D Day. Clever, no?
1. Divyang is never to be questioned.
2. Divyang's beliefs are your beliefs.
3. You must provide Divyang with a gift on his birthday.
cause.mission: uhh...make Divyang's birthday a national holiday.
cause.name: Make Divyang's Birthday a National Holiday
